oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Proposed Charter for the Consolidated Government of Clarksville and Montgomery County, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1980 Charter Commission completed the Proposed Charter in October 1980. The Charter intended to modernize and streamline government operations in Clarksville-Montgomery County.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Executive departments--Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
